about.content_01: Catalonia Offline is a mobile application created by the Institut Cartogràfic i Geològic de Catalunya (ICGC) that allows you to move around Catalunya, save points and record your routes and excursions with GPS even if you do not have a data plan for your phone.
about.content_02: This application allows download and display of the ICGC cartography, both the topographic map and the orthophoto map.
about.title: About...

downloadingAlert.content_01: Data downloading of the Topographic Map of Catalonia is needed to be able to work in areas with poor coverage.
downloadingAlert.content_02: If you don't want to download the data now, you can continue navigating with an online version, and you will be prompted to download them afterwards.
downloadingAlert.content_03: Download now the Topographic Map of Catalonia? (350 MB)
downloadingAlert.title: Offline data download

import.length: Importing more than {{max_features}} features is not allowed.
import.unmanaged_errors: {{totalFeatures}} entities have been processed for which {{numberOfErrors}} failed to import.

search.noConnectivity: Cannot search because there is no connection.

gpx.label: GPX file
gpx.message: Standard for sharing GPS recorded routes between devices. Does not contain the photos

kmz.label: KMZ file
kmz.message: Google Earth file, contains the geometries and their photos

zip.label: ZIP file
zip.message: Compressed file containing a GeoJSON and a folder with photos
